# ClearEdge Home Buyers

## About
ClearEdge Home Buyers (ClearEdge Properties LLC) is a cash home buying company serving Eastern Pennsylvania. We purchase homes in any condition for cash, providing homeowners with a fast, hassle-free alternative to traditional real estate sales.

## Owner
Tyler, Founder

## Services
- Cash home purchases in any condition
- No repairs needed
- No agent fees or commissions
- Fast closings (as quick as 7 days)
- Fair cash offers within 24 hours

## Service Areas
Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Allentown, Bethlehem, Easton, Reading, Hazleton, Stroudsburg, East Stroudsburg, Honesdale, Carbondale, Pittston, Kingston, Nanticoke, Dunmore, Bloomsburg, Pottsville, Pocono Pines, Tannersville, Lehigh Valley, Poconos, and surrounding areas in Eastern Pennsylvania.

## Counties Served
Lackawanna, Luzerne, Lehigh, Northampton, Berks, Monroe, Wayne, Columbia, Schuylkill, Carbon, Pike

## Contact
- Website: https://www.clearedgehomebuyers.com
- Phone: (610) 904-8526
- Email: info@clearedgehomebuyers.com

## Situations We Help With
- Foreclosure
- Divorce
- Inherited property
- Relocating
- Downsizing
- Problem tenants
- Major repairs needed
- Behind on payments

## How It Works
1. Contact us with your property details
2. Receive a fair cash offer within 24 hours
3. Close on your timeline (as fast as 7 days)
